description: Since 2010, OpenHatch has been running workshops at college campuses, teaching undergrads how to get involved in open source. In 2015, we expect to reach over 500 students through 25 events. This talk presents how we've the scaled program over the years, how we've evolved our curriculum, and how you can get involved.
title: OSB 2015 - Five years, 1000 students: The story of Open Source Comes to Campus - Asheesh Laroia
